Person.Demographie.AdministrativesGeschl: SELECT r1.encounter_num AS "Fall.Versorgungsstellenkontakt.Aufnahmenummer", r2.concept_cd AS "Person.Demographie.AdministrativesGeschlecht" FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT encounter_num, start_date AS i2b2_start_date FROM visit_dimension ) AS r_intermediate) r1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT encounter_num, concept_cd FROM observation_fact WHERE concept_cd LIKE 'Dem|Sex:%' AND modifier_cd = '@' ) r2 ON r1.encounter_num = r2.encounter_num;
Person.Demographie.Geburtsdatum: SELECT r1.patient_num AS "Person.PatientIn.Patienten-Identifikator.Patienten-Identifikator", r2.birth_date::date AS "Person.Demographie.Geburtsdatum" FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT patient_num, start_date AS i2b2_start_date FROM visit_dimension ) AS r_intermediate) r1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT patient_num, birth_date FROM patient_dimension ) r2 ON r1.patient_num = r2.patient_num;
Person.Demographie.Adresse.Strassenansch: SELECT r1.patient_num AS "Person.PatientIn.Patienten-Identifikator.Patienten-Identifikator", r2.zip_cd AS "Person.Demographie.Adresse.Strassenanschrift.PLZ" FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT patient_num, start_date AS i2b2_start_date FROM visit_dimension ) AS r_intermediate) r1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT patient_num, zip_cd FROM patient_dimension ) r2 ON r1.patient_num = r2.patient_num;
Fall.Versorgungsstellenkontakt.Aufnahmen: SELECT r1.patient_num AS "Person.PatientIn.Patienten-Identifikator.Patienten-Identifikator", r1.encounter_num AS "Fall.Versorgungsstellenkontakt.Aufnahmenummer" FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT encounter_num, patient_num, start_date AS i2b2_start_date FROM visit_dimension ) AS r_intermediate) r1;
Person.PatientIn.Patienten-Identifikator: SELECT r1.patient_num AS "Person.PatientIn.Patienten-Identifikator.Patienten-Identifikator", r1.encounter_num AS "Fall.Versorgungsstellenkontakt.Aufnahmenummer" FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT encounter_num, patient_num, start_date AS i2b2_start_date FROM visit_dimension ) AS r_intermediate) r1;
Fall.Versorgungsstellenkontakt.Beginndat: SELECT r1.encounter_num AS "Fall.Versorgungsstellenkontakt.Aufnahmenummer", r1.i2b2_start_date AS "Fall.Versorgungsstellenkontakt.Beginndatum" FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT encounter_num, start_date AS i2b2_start_date FROM visit_dimension ) AS r_intermediate) r1;
Fall.Versorgungsstellenkontakt.Enddatum: SELECT r1.encounter_num AS "Fall.Versorgungsstellenkontakt.Aufnahmenummer", r1.end_date AS "Fall.Versorgungsstellenkontakt.Enddatum" FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT encounter_num, start_date AS i2b2_start_date, end_date FROM visit_dimension ) AS r_intermediate) r1;
Diagnose.ICD10GMDiagnoseKodiert.Vollstae: SELECT r1.encounter_num AS "Fall.Versorgungsstellenkontakt.Aufnahmenummer",r2.concept_cd AS "Diagnose.ICD10GMDiagnoseKodiert.VollstaendigerDiagnosekode" FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT encounter_num, start_date AS i2b2_start_date FROM visit_dimension ) AS r_intermediate) r1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT encounter_num, concept_cd FROM observation_fact WHERE concept_cd LIKE 'ICD10:%' AND modifier_cd = '@' ) r2 ON r1.encounter_num = r2.encounter_num WHERE r2.concept_cd IS NOT NULL;
Prozedur.OPSProzedurKodiert.Vollstaendig: SELECT r1.encounter_num AS "Fall.Versorgungsstellenkontakt.Aufnahmenummer",r2.concept_cd AS "Prozedur.OPSProzedurKodiert.VollstaendigerProzedurenkode" FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT encounter_num, start_date AS i2b2_start_date FROM visit_dimension ) AS r_intermediate) r1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT encounter_num, concept_cd FROM observation_fact WHERE concept_cd LIKE 'OPS:%' AND modifier_cd = '@' ) r2 ON r1.encounter_num = r2.encounter_num WHERE r2.concept_cd IS NOT NULL;
Fall.Abteilungskontakt.Fachabteilungssch: SELECT r1.encounter_num AS "Fall.Versorgungsstellenkontakt.Aufnahmenummer",r2.concept_cd AS "Fall.Abteilungskontakt.Fachabteilungsschluessel" FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT encounter_num, start_date AS i2b2_start_date FROM visit_dimension ) AS r_intermediate) r1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT encounter_num, concept_cd FROM observation_fact WHERE concept_cd LIKE 'Fall|Fachabteilungsschluessel:%' AND modifier_cd = '@' ) r2 ON r1.encounter_num = r2.encounter_num;
Fall.Einrichtungskontakt.Entlassungsgrun: SELECT r1.encounter_num AS "Fall.Versorgungsstellenkontakt.Aufnahmenummer",r2.concept_cd AS "Fall.Einrichtungskontakt.Entlassungsgrund" FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT encounter_num, start_date AS i2b2_start_date FROM visit_dimension ) AS r_intermediate) r1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT encounter_num, concept_cd FROM observation_fact WHERE concept_cd LIKE 'Fall|Entlassungsgrund:%' AND modifier_cd = '@' ) r2 ON r1.encounter_num = r2.encounter_num WHERE r2.concept_cd IS NOT NULL;
Fall.Einrichtungskontakt.Aufnahmeanlass: SELECT r1.encounter_num AS "Fall.Versorgungsstellenkontakt.Aufnahmenummer",r2.concept_cd AS "Fall.Einrichtungskontakt.Aufnahmeanlass" FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT encounter_num, start_date AS i2b2_start_date FROM visit_dimension ) AS r_intermediate) r1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT encounter_num, concept_cd FROM observation_fact WHERE concept_cd LIKE 'Fall|Aufnahmeanlass:%' AND modifier_cd = '@' ) r2 ON r1.encounter_num = r2.encounter_num WHERE r2.concept_cd IS NOT NULL;
Fall.Einrichtungskontakt.Aufnahmegrund: SELECT r1.encounter_num AS "Fall.Versorgungsstellenkontakt.Aufnahmenummer",r2.concept_cd AS "Fall.Einrichtungskontakt.Aufnahmegrund" FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT encounter_num, start_date AS i2b2_start_date FROM visit_dimension ) AS r_intermediate) r1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT encounter_num, concept_cd FROM observation_fact WHERE concept_cd LIKE 'Fall|Aufnahmegrund:%' AND modifier_cd = '@' ) r2 ON r1.encounter_num = r2.encounter_num;
Laborbefund.Laboruntersuchung.Code: SELECT r1.encounter_num AS "Fall.Versorgungsstellenkontakt.Aufnahmenummer",r2.concept_cd AS "Laborbefund.Laboruntersuchung.Code" FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT encounter_num, start_date AS i2b2_start_date FROM visit_dimension ) AS r_intermediate) r1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT encounter_num, concept_cd FROM observation_fact WHERE concept_cd LIKE 'LOINC:%' AND modifier_cd = 'LOINC:26436-6' ) r2 ON r1.encounter_num = r2.encounter_num;
Fall.Versorgungsstellenkontakt.KontaktKl: SELECT r1.encounter_num AS "Fall.Versorgungsstellenkontakt.Aufnahmenummer",r2.concept_cd AS "Fall.Versorgungsstellenkontakt.KontaktKlasse" FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT encounter_num, start_date AS i2b2_start_date FROM visit_dimension ) AS r_intermediate) r1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT encounter_num, concept_cd FROM observation_fact WHERE concept_cd LIKE 'Fall|Versorgungsfallklasse:%' AND modifier_cd = '@' ) r2 ON r1.encounter_num = r2.encounter_num;
